description: Try our easy to follow Classic Bacardi Mojito With Fresh Lime & Mint recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Classic Bacardi Mojito With Fresh Lime & Mint Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, cut into wedges (plus one to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze and drop 4 wedges of lime (half a lime) and two teaspoons of sugar into a highball glass.
Add 45ml of rum and stir to dissolve sugar.
Put 12 mint leaves between palms and clap to release mint oils and place in glass.
Fill glass with ice and stir ingredients.
Top with soda and garnish with a wedge of lime and a sprig of mint.
